specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get +1 to their melee rolls.
specialRules.name: Battle Rites

specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get +1 to their melee rolls.

specialRules.hint: This model and his unit get the Regeneration rule.

specialRules.description: This model and his unit get the Regeneration rule.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get AP(+1) when shooting.
specialRules.name: Precision Shots

specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get AP(+1) when shooting.

specialRules.hint: Counts as having the Fearless rule, as well as having Regeneration against non- spell attacks (this stacks with Regeneration).
specialRules.name: Prime
specialRules.label: Prime
specialRules.description: Counts as having the Fearless rule, as well as having Regeneration against non- spell attacks (this stacks with Regeneration).

specialRules.hint: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.
specialRules.name: Repair
specialRules.label: Repair
specialRules.description: Once per turn, if within 2” of a unit with Tough, roll one die. On a 2+ you may repair 1 wound from the target.

specialRules.hint: Enemies get -1 to hit when they attack units where all models have this rule.
specialRules.name: Shield Wall
specialRules.label: Shield Wall
specialRules.description: Enemies get -1 to hit when they attack units where all models have this rule.

specialRules.hint: This model gets +1 to its attack rolls for melee and shooting.
specialRules.name: Veteran Infantry
specialRules.label: Veteran Infantry
specialRules.description: This model gets +1 to its attack rolls for melee and shooting.

specialRules.hint: The hero and his unit get +1 attack in melee when charging.
specialRules.name: War Chant
specialRules.label: War Chant
specialRules.description: The hero and his unit get +1 attack in melee when charging.

spells.name: Blurred Sight
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” gets -1 to hit next time it shoots.

spells.name: Psychic Terror
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 12” takes 2 automatic hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Cursed Ground
spells.effect: Target enemy unit within 18” moves -6” next time it charges.

spells.name: Cerebral Trauma
spells.effect: Target enemy model within 12” takes 1 automatic hit with AP(3).

spells.name: Time Passage
spells.effect: Target friendly unit within 12” may immediately move by up to 6”.

spells.name: Lightning Fog
spells.effect: Target 2 enemy units within 6” take 8 automatic hits each.
